name: The New Adventures Of Billy The Kid
name_original: The New Adventures Of Billy The Kid
description:
Lonesome Cowboy Faust.

Short adventure game made in 6 days and originally released May 2010. As of 2022 it works best in compatability mode for Windows XP. Made in Adventure Game Studio. Music credits in readme. Toggle fullscreen with "winsetup.exe".

CONTROLS:

leftclick - walk

rightclick - interact

esc - menu

NOTE: you may need to rightclick inventory items to select them.
